root.name: split()
root.description: The split() function is used to divide a String into its separate elements. This function splits a string into pieces using a character or string as the divider. The delim parameter specifies the character or characters which mark the boundaries between each data element. To convert a String to an array of integers or floats, use the datatype conversion functions int() and float() to convert the array of Strings (see example above).

parameter.label: delim
parameter.description: the character or String used to separate the data
